Title: Short Cuts
Writer: Raymond Carver (writings), Robert Altman (screenplay), Frank Barhydt (screenplay)
Actors: Andie MacDowell, Bruce Davison, Jack Lemmon, Zane Cassidy
Plot: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 17 wins & 18 nominations.
Production: Fine Line Features, Avenue Pictures Productions
